code: import React,{useState}from"react";import SearchBar from"./SearchBar";import ResultsList from"./ResultsList";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[results,setResults]=useState([]);const handleSearch=async query=>{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/search",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({query})});const data=await response.json();setResults(data.results);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"AI Agent Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{onSearch:handleSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResultsList,{results:results})]});};export default App;
